content:
path /v3/ledger/account/block/account/id
operationId deleteAllBlockAmount
parameters
description Account ID
in path
name id
required True
schema
type string
summary Unblock all blocked amounts in an account
description 1 credit per API call 1 credit for each deleted blockage 1 API call  2 blockages   3 creditsUnblocks previously blocked amounts in an account Increases the available balance in the account where the amount was blocked
responses
